evidence.source_document: United States' Motion for a Preliminary Injunction Against Denka Performance Elastomer
evidence.text: For the reasons explained in the accompanying memorandum of law, the United States respectfully asks this Court to grant this motion and issue the proposed Preliminary Injunction Order.
